name: Procom Venture
overview: Procom Venture is a Norwegian based early stage venture capital company focusing on companies in the Petroleum-, Clean Energy- and Industrial Biotechnology sectors. The company was established in 2002, and has a team of 6 experienced professionals. The team has a proven strong track record for value creation and operates via an innovative â€œSpeed Seedâ€ model for early-stage investments. The team is actively searching for investment ideas that provide promising technologies with a significant global market potential from its many alliances with R&D institutions and from its team members extensive network. The team has created a significant portfolio of companies within the above areas, and is using its unique Speed Seed model to create shareholder value.
